verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee with my <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart:<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> will I sing <S%H2167>praise<s%> unto thee.

I will <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple,<s%> and <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H5921>for<s%> thy <S%H571>truth:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou hast <S%H1431>magnified<s%> thy <S%H565>word<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>
In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H7121>cried<s%> thou <S%H6030>answeredst<s%> me, and <S%H7292>strengthenedst<s%> me with <S%H5797>strength<s%> in my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
Yea, they shall <S%H7891>sing<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Though <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H7311>high,<s%> yet hath he <S%H7200>respect<s%> unto the <S%H8217>lowly:<s%> but the <S%H1364>proud<s%> he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> afar <S%H4480>off.<s%> <S%H4801><s%>

Though <S%H518><s%> I <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> thou wilt <S%H2421>revive<s%> me: thou shalt stretch <S%H7971>forth<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of mine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall <S%H3467>save<s%> me.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1584>perfect<s%> that which <S%H1157>concerneth<s%> me: thy <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> endureth <S%H5769>forever:<s%> <S%H7503>forsake<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of thine own <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
